releaseNotes:
Noty v1.4 - AI Task Creation Enhancements

• Improved AI Transcription: Enhanced accuracy for both English and Egyptian Arabic
• Advanced Task Extraction: Better context recognition in voice recordings
• Smart Priority Detection: Automatic priority assignment based on speech context
• Improved Task Categorization: More accurate automatic category selection
• Enhanced UI Experience: Smoother recording and transcription flow
• Performance Optimizations: Faster AI processing and response times
• Bug Fixes: Fixed various minor issues throughout the app
